about_the_game:
Pets & Stuff – a cute, fun and relaxing game where you become a skilful groomer and veterinarian. Help little friends in trouble, make them happy, pampered, clean, well-fed, and don't forget to add a pinch of chic. Let your imagination run wild! Enjoy a fully responsive and polished gameplay, make the best trims, feel the fur at the end of your fingertips and capture the best photoshoots of your creations.

Cuteness overload and furrrr everywhere guaranteed!

KEY FEATURES:

  • There are so many lovely animals here! Adorable cats and dogs included in the demo

  • A variety of products and tools available to treat and care for your little friends! Coloring, cleaning and feeding available in the demo

  • The first chapter - the Clinic - included in the demo

  • Ability to upgrade 4 pieces of furniture included in the demo to to make it your style! Chair, door, pet table and trashbin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, Meta Quest 3S, HTC Vive, Valve Index
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required
